titleStmt.title: Sir Walter Raleigh sailing in the Low-Lands shewing how the famous ship called the Sweet Trinity was taken by a false gally, and how it was again restored by the craft of a little sea-boy, who sunk the gally, as the following song will declare : to the tune of The sailing in the Low-Lands.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication from NUC pre-1956 imprints.
